verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H7440>plea;<s%> <S%H7181><s%> Give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> that <S%H3808>doesn't<s%> go out of <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
Let my <S%H4941>sentence<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> from your <S%H6440>presence.<s%> Let your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2372>look<s%> on <S%H4339>equity.<s%>

You have <S%H974>proved<s%> my <S%H3820>heart.<s%> You have <S%H6485>visited<s%> me in the <S%H3915>night.<s%> You have <S%H6884>tried<s%> <S%H4672>me,<s%> and found <S%H2161>nothing.<s%> I have resolved that my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall not <S%H5674>disobey.<s%>
As for the <S%H6468>works<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of your <S%H8193>lips,<s%> I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> myself from the <S%H734>ways<s%> of the <S%H6530>violent.<s%>
My <S%H838>steps<s%> have held <S%H8551>fast<s%> to your <S%H4570>paths.<s%> My <S%H6471>feet<s%> have not <S%H4131>slipped.<s%>
I have <S%H7121>called<s%> on <S%H6030>you,<s%> for you will answer <S%H410>me,<s%> God. <S%H5186>Turn<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H8085>me.<s%> Hear my <S%H565>speech.<s%>
Show your <S%H6395>marvelous<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> you who <S%H3467>save<s%> those who take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> by your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> from their <S%H6965>enemies.<s%>
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> me as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of your <S%H1323>eye.<s%> <S%H5641>Hide<s%> me under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings,<s%>
They <S%H5462>close<s%> up their <S%H2459>callous<s%> <S%H6310>hearts.<s%> With their mouth they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H1348>proudly.<s%>
They have now <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> us in our <S%H838>steps.<s%> They <S%H7896>set<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to cast us <S%H5186>down<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He is <S%H1825>like<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> that is <S%H3700>greedy<s%> of his <S%H2963>prey,<s%> as it were a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H3427>lurking<s%> in secret <S%H4565>places.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3068>confront<s%> <S%H6440>him.<s%> Cast him <S%H3766>down.<s%> <S%H6403>Deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> by your <S%H2719>sword;<s%>

from <S%H4962>men<s%> by your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> from <S%H4962>men<s%> of the <S%H2465>world,<s%> whose <S%H2506>portion<s%> is in this <S%H2416>life.<s%> You <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H990>belly<s%> of your <S%H6840>cherished<s%> <S%H1121>ones.<s%> Your sons have <S%H7646>plenty,<s%> and they <S%H3240>store<s%> up <S%H3499>wealth<s%> for their <S%H5768>children.<s%>
As for <S%H2372>me,<s%> I shall see your <S%H6440>face<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> I shall be <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> when I <S%H6974>awake,<s%> with seeing your <S%H8544>form.<s%>
